thread.title_full: Financial Analyst - GREAT location DOWNTOWN! at Robert Half Finance & Accounting (Dallas, TX)

title: Financial Analyst - GREAT location DOWNTOWN! at Robert Half Finance & Accounting (Dallas, TX)
text: Classification: Financial Analyst Compensation: $61,363.99 to $75,000.00 per year Our client, located in downtown Dallas, is seeking a strong financial analyst to join their growing practice. This position will report to the Executive Director and will be responsible for creating and maintaining financial models, analyzing data, and presenting findings to the Executive board. Candidates should have a bachelors degree in Accounting or Finance, heavy experience working in Excel (vlookups, pivots, macros) and the potential to scale with the firm's growth. SAP experience is a plus. For confidential consideration, email resumes to Cameron.Martin@roberthalf.com with the title 'Financial Analyst - Downtown Dallas.'
